item.title: Best 20 things to do in Prague
item.description: Prague is the capital of Czech republic and one of the best cities of Europe.

item.title: 6 things to do in Hallstatt
item.description: Would you like to spend a day with beautiful landscapes? Hallstatt is the perfect place to do that!

item.title: Top 13 things to do in Barcelona
item.description: Barcelona is the capital of Catalonia’s region and the second biggest city in Spain. They called it “the city that never sleeps”. It is known for culture, architecture and mild weather. Let’s take a tour in Barcelona! 1. Sagrada Familia An unfinished church designed by the catalan architect Antoni Gaud√≠. The construction has started on 1882 and it is expected to be completed by 2026. Its unique architecture and special design have made it the modern symbol of Barcelona.
